# [Interview #849: Memories of Light, Entry #36](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=849#36)

#### Day 36

"Run, Bela," Faile said. "If you've kept any strength back, now is the time to use it. Please. Run, girl.
*Run*
." (p. 760)
